attributes.title: Just Awful
attributes.review: This is one of the worst apps out there. It’s unorganized, ugly, and just bad. You think that bunker boy could do better but I guess not. Would never recommend!!

attributes.title: What’s the point?
attributes.review: This app isn’t helping us, the world is getting worse the app is making the world even more worse, please delete this app!

This app is the worst app i ever used in my whole entire life, I have never been so disappointed and disgusted to use an app it was all about this orange cheeto looking guy 🤢🤢🤢🤢 app store get rid of this 💀

attributes.title: Why would anyone get this app
attributes.review: Trump is a horrible person. He is homophobic, transphobic, racists, and many many more. If you support him you are also all those things.

attributes.title: Major yikes
attributes.review: I tried to be a good person to see why people want to vote for this orange. Major yikes he hasn’t really been true to his word and making matters worse. Yikes so much for a president.

attributes.title: This is trash
attributes.review: This app doesn’t provide any useful information to anyone in the public and should not be on the App Store in general. I’m sorry for anyone who believed it would be a good app. Yikes

attributes.title: Hey trump supporters and gen z read this :)
attributes.review: OK SO... y’all try to take away tiktok because we messed up the trump rally? that’s cool because, we will simply take away y’all trashy app! have fun not being able to support trump on here😻.

attributes.title: My dog
attributes.review: I was trying to get to see how “my great president” was doing but once I open the app this weird sound started to come out and I was with my dog and my started to shake it my dog died so thank you, you so nice president 🤢🤢💔💔💔🥺🥺🥺🐥🐥🐥🐥🐥🐥🐥🐥🐥🐥🐥🐥🐥🐥🐥🐥🐥🐥🐥🐥🐥🐥🐥

attributes.title: Bad App
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever I downloaded in my life it took weeks to download it has many glitches in my phone doesn’t work properly

attributes.title: BAN THIS APP
attributes.review: It legit made my phone lag so bad when I downloaded the app and it also froze up my phone like right now I am struggling to download a app this is so annoying so I’m gonna delete this Dumb app !!!!!!!
